author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Chua Tian Bok Timothy v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Subhas Anandan and Anand Nalachandran (Harry Elias Partnership) for petitioner; Benjamin Yim Geok Choon (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for respondent
tags: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Compounding of offences
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Compounding of offences/Voluntarily causing hurt in road rage incident/Victim consenting to composition after seeking independent legal advice/Whether judge's discretion to refuse composition correctly exercised/Considerations of public interest/Section 199 Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68, 1985 Rev Ed), s 323 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)
